title: Very nice in-Law apartment in Sunset$2300/2br-800ft2
posting_body: This is an recently remodeled in-law apartment in Sunset District.
It's on 1st floor with 2 bedroom,1 bathroom,1 combined living room/dining room/Kitchen area.
Washer and Dryer is available, the place is nice and comfortable with fresh air and good sunlight.
The entrance to the in-law is independent from the main entrance of the house.
It's close to a commercial street (Irving ST, Lincoln way and the Golden gate park)
It's conveniently close to transportation and grocery shopping, muni train to downtown is N Judah and other muni buses to other areas close by.
No parties and no pets please.
If interested, please email me with a short resume about yourself.
